body: J Rahman at Mukti comments on a sad fact of India-Bangladesh relation: "as soon as Indians realize that Bangladesh is not in the business of allowing its territory to the insurgents and other powers, India has no interest in resolving any other outstanding issue."
original_body: J Rahman at Mukti comments on a sad fact of India-Bangladesh relation: "as soon as Indians realize that Bangladesh is not in the business of allowing its territory to the insurgents and other powers, India has no interest in resolving any other outstanding issue."
title: Indo-Bangla Relations - Who Cares?

sentence: J Rahman at Mukti comments on a sad fact of India-Bangladesh relation: "as soon as Indians realize that Bangladesh is not in the business of allowing its territory to the insurgents and other powers, India has no interest in resolving any other outstanding issue."
